title: Forest Park: A Zombie Novel
description: Would you surrender to a world which has gone insane? Would you run and hide if the dead began to walk the streets in search of new victims? Or would you fight, make compromises and try to survive to the next dawn- if only to see the sun rise once more.In a world where zombies walk the streets, and the people in charge hide deep beneath the ground- what chance does the ordinary person have?
author: Jamie Marks
